meanings.definition: A group of reptiles that includes mammals and their extinct relatives.
meanings.sent1: The synapsids were ancient reptiles that eventually evolved into mammals.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study synapsids to learn more about the evolution of mammals.
meanings.sent3: The synapsids threw a party to celebrate their unique place in the reptile family tree.
meanings.sent4: The synapsids paved the way for the diverse range of mammals we see today.
meanings.sent5: In the world of reptiles, the synapsids stand out as the ancestors of mammals.

meanings.definition: Relating to or characteristic of synapsids.
meanings.sent1: The fossil showed distinct synapsid features, indicating its relation to early mammals.
meanings.sent2: Her research focused on the synapsid characteristics present in ancient reptiles.
meanings.sent3: The synapsid-themed party decorations were a hit among paleontologists.
meanings.sent4: His synapsid-like behavior made him stand out in the group of researchers.
meanings.sent5: The synapsid traits in the creature's DNA were a clear link to its evolutionary history.

meanings.sent1: The paleontologist carefully examined the synapsid skull structure to understand its anatomy.
meanings.sent2: The synapsid skull structure revealed unique features that set it apart from other reptiles.
meanings.sent3: The synapsid skull structure seemed to wink at the researcher, as if sharing a secret.
meanings.sent4: The intricate synapsid skull structure was like a puzzle waiting to be solved.
meanings.sent5: The synapsid skull structure was a fascinating subject for the anatomy class to explore.
